body: Avicus in-game donor tags are currently the actual words 'diamond', 'emerald', 'gold', etc. Which is fine, but it makes the in-game chat look absolutely horrendous, unorganized, etc. Compared to Overcast tags which are nice little colored asterisks/diamonds/symbols, which look so much cleaner. I think Avicus should also make their donor tags symbols, doesn't have to be asterisks, but something cleaner than what it is right now. You can compare how clean the chats from the two servers are:
